* Currently bachelor technology student of Computer Science engineering.
* Good experience with GNU/Linux.      
* Core member of neogeography consultant group called <nowiki>[[http://geohackers.in|Geohackers.in]]</nowiki>
* Area of interest: Accessibility (a11y). Testing.
